item.description:
Well I'm an organizer in the Cross Country Ski group. And since I haven't organized an official running group yet, I figured I would double post this to the running group. 

So without further ado ...

Let's get in some cross country skiing before we settle in and watch the big game. The conditions should be great with all the new snow. 

We'll meet in the touring center at 10. Depending upon whose there we'll probably split up into groups by ability. I figure we can ski for a hour and half and then meet back at the center for lunch. Afterward people can continue skiing. 

Bring a lunch, beverages, and some snacks. And dress in layers.

A day pass at the center costs $11 dollars (cash only). They also rent skis at the center.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a yellow cap with a bucking bronco on it.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Cross Country Ski on Super Sunday
